what_you_do: Pam Richardson is a Money Coach who helps guide her clients to be more calm and confident with their money.
who_you_serve: Pam works with clients who are dealing with debt, compulsive spending, and other money-related issues.
social_proof: Pam has first-hand experience with debt, compulsive spending, and the repercussions in her own life.
business_focus: Pam helps her clients find peace, clarity, and freedom in their finances.
service_provided: Money coaching, financial wellness workshops, entrepreneurship workshops
